SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Providers] ( [Providers_Ky] smallint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Providers_Descrizione] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_smtp] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_pop3] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_webmail] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_pop3s] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_smtps] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_pop3sporta] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_smtpsporta] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_webmail2] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_UserInsert] int NULL , [Providers_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Providers_UserDelete] int NULL , [Providers_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Providers_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Providers_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [Providers_Logo] varchar(200) NULL , [Providers_SitoWeb] varchar(200) NULL , [Providers_Imap] varchar(100) NULL , [Providers_ImapPorta] varchar(100) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Providers] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Providers PRIMARY KEY ([Providers_Ky])
